fixes.name: Revenue
fixes.dax_expression: 'raw_data (Dashboard Lesson - Coffee Shop Sales)'[transaction_qty] * 'raw_data (Dashboard Lesson - Coffee Shop Sales)'[unit_price]
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the dependent calculated field Revenue from Tableau ([transaction_qty] * [unit_price]) to a row-level DAX calculated column using the same table's columns. This is a row-level arithmetic operation, so it is implemented as a calculated column.

fixes.name: BATCH
fixes.solution_explanation: The Tableau expression references the calculated field [Revenue]. After creating Revenue as a calculated column, BATCH simply references that column at row level, so it is implemented as a calculated column.
